desc: This is the proposed STU1 version of the Standardized Medication Profile (SMP) FHIR IG for ballot in September 2024. It is sponsored by the HL7 Pharmacy Work Group
title: US Standardized Medication Profile (SMP)
introduction: This implementation identifies and defines the components of an interoperable medication profile for clinicians, patients and caregivers to use for the exchange of essential medication information during transitions of care to and from post-acute care settings.
